data.text:
To whose who are in doubt and can't decide where to go to get some sun, enjoy warm, crystal clear water,  beautiful views,  gorgeous beach and do it in comfort,  surrounded by service minded personnel I would ðŸ’¯ recommend this resort! 
By all means it was one of the best experience we have had so far (9 times in Egypt already,  so have something to compare with). 
Huge territory of resort drawing in palms,  bushes,  flowers. Everything is super nice and neat, clean, well arranged, gives you pure pleasure just to walk around. Numerous swimming pools for any taste, level and liking.  Spacious rooms, comfortable and big beds, good quality linen, towels and toiletries. 
Very nice a la cart restaurants ðŸ‘Œ,  decent variety of food in the main restaurant, excellent pool bar, huge beach equipped with comfortable beds/matrasses, giant, soft towels. 
Special thanks and respect to each and everyone from Front Desk Team! You are super stars and done your absolute best to help us to feel welcome and taken care of! Every request we had was met with understanding,  support and immediate attention. Truly professional team of receptionists,  kitchen staff, waiters, house keepers. Everyone was always smily, polite and sweet everywhere we went.
Great animation team, very energetic and skilled,  there was no evening we were bored or had nothing to do, our kids absolutely loved beach entertainment as well as evening shows.
There is also a gym and spa, for whose who needs daily training or craves for relaxation sessions during full body massage. Massage was excellent,  performed by educated specialists,  spa management and staff were very helpful and friendly at all times! 
Great thanks to each and everyone who works there,  we will definitely be back and by all means will recommend you to our friends and family! 
See you soon!
data.title: Family friendly, high quality,  extremely comfortable place to spend holiday,  strongly recommend!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear valued guest,

The SUNRISE Royal Makadi Resort -Select- Team thanks you very much for these wonderful compliments. We are very pleased that we could meet your expectations and proud of your comments!
		
We hope to welcome you once again in the nearest future at SUNRISE Royal Makadi Resort -Select and wish you all the best!
	
Sunny regards,		
Hotel Management
owner_response.author: Tucana Resort

data.text:
Second time at this resort. Same like the others, I suppose - I just wanted to know what to expect. This resort is very good indeed. It is very clean and the food is very good too. If you are a picky eater and want to know what to eat, you can opt for the a la carte restaurants which are unlimited. However, the bufet is impressive too. Sometimes, there arenâ€™t enough signs for the sauces and you have to guess what is what especially by the salad corners. If you are a food lover, you will love this. There are so many different kinds of food, at times you think too much. All of this from the desire to please all the customers. There are several Russians salads and Eastern European dishes, lots of German food, arabic traditional food, and of course the classics pasta station, chips and meats. Every evening there was grilled meats and roasted chicken and beef. Lots of sauces and stews covering different cultures and cuisines were available. Fruit and salads were delicious and plentiful. This is a paradise for vegetarians and vegans. So many delicious grilled veg and falafel and hummus and spreads. Lunch was great with fresh pizza to order and fresh cips and delicious burgers at the terrace/ snack bar if you want to skip the main buffet. The keeping of the hotel grounds is fantastic. The amount of workers caring for this place is incredible. From
The gardens, the rooms, the restaurants to the cleaners.  I have never walked into a dirty toilet in my entire stay. There is someone cleaning all the time, including at the beach. Always spotless. 
The rooms are not luxurious. We stayed in a family room and it is adequate and clean. Whatever lacks in opulence and luxury, it makes up in the friendliness of the staff. Our room cleaner was brilliant and so was the entire staff throughout. Such hard working people and I am glad that this has not changed. One good thing that has changed is that the animation team and program is even better this time around. The program is packed with activities and more evening shows now that there used to be. There are kids parties, lessons and even a colour and foam party at the beach. They all work very hard and are so friendly. The sellers at the beach might seem a nuisance but they are just trying to do their job. If you say no thank you, they will respect that. Smile and be polite, they will respect you. The smoothies on the beach are delicious. We had a couple for the children and when we tasted them, we decided to buy every day. 3 dollars, make a deal with them and get a discount. The hotel was occupied by Germans mainly and it was a very busy Easter break period with lots of families with children. My children didnâ€™t make many friends as predominantly they were speaking German. Some English too but not too many. My girls only went once to kids club for the pizza making but the ladies seemed nice there. Also, they now provide kids club all day long. They have kids activities from 9 to 22. That is impressive! 
The only reason why I am not giving it a 5 star is because I would have loved to see some benefits for being a returning costumer. We have booked the hotel separate and not as a package and we didnâ€™t feel it was any better or worse. The room we were given was standard.No upgrades. When we left, we paid for late checkout and for a towel card which we have miss-placed. It would have been nice if that would have been offered to us for free. Would we recommend this hotel? Absolutely!!!!
Will we return? Maybe! It was a great holiday and we miss the place already.
data.title: Second visit during busy Easter Break

data.text: A great Hotel. The food was really good, I went there with 7 friends, nobody got any stomach problems.  We hade an awesome time there, when went there to just escape the hard, stressful daily routine. We have all a very stressful working day. Some of use are entrepreneurial the rest is in leading position. If you give the staffs a little tip, they will take so much care of you. They also have some really great animator. I have to mention Michaela, she is such an awesome animator. Also Olivia was such a nice person to meet. We played UNO together we had so much fun. Havenâ€™t laughed  that hard in a long time.  Beside that poor and criminal county and that strange intrusive people at the airport, this is a nice place to be.
data.title: Great awesome nice place to be

data.text: We were in Egypt for the first time. Also the first time in this hotel. Beautiful, well-kept, huge territory. The staff is polite and always smiling. Rooms clean, cleaned every day. The food is tasty. I really recommend it.

data.text: I have been to Egypt several times before, but this time I enjoyed it the most because this hotel has great staff and nice people. The food was excellent. Animators made sure that I was not bored during the entire vacation and I will definitely return to this hotel more often. It is the best hotel in Egypt.
data.title: The best hotel in Egypt
